reviewText:
Seems like it was almost 20 years ago since I've seen this but it has always stayed with me. One of the best animal films I've ever seen. Referring to it as a documentary doesn't seem to do it justice.

It will touch your heart I promise.

I just wish I could find it in a modern digital format!

I have owned a copy this tape for several years, and found it compelling, informative, funny and sad.  I purchased the recent copy as a gift for a young friend, also an animal lover.  I hope he enjoys it as much as I have.
Love this video!!! - love Donald Sutherland narrating, the story is fantastic!- why isn't it on DVD yet????  Hopefully soon....
I had been looking for People of the Forest for years.  I used to have it on personal vhs but someone taped over it.  I'm so glad I was able to find it here.  The video quality is perfect.

This amusingly narrated movie about the life of a troop of chimpanzees is one of my favorite movies of all time.  You can watch this over and over again.  While I'm sure this production is guilty of a touch of anthropomorphization, it's nonetheless a good buy.  I'm here writing this review because I want this on DVD.  This is one of my favorite movie purchases of all time.

If you're sick of handing money to the Hollywood machine for more Ben Affleck movies, buy this quality entertainment.
One of the most touching stories ever seen.  Beautiful! A MUST SEE.  I lost mine...anyone know where I can get copy?  Will pay..please email me mslack@dca.net  Thanks
